Keyword.descr: Defines the x-coordinate of the background-position property (IE4)
Defines the y-coordinate of the background-position property (IE4)
Used to define the URL for a script providing DHTML behavior (IE5)
Used to apply filter effects to associated HTML elements (IE4)
Used to set the state of an Input Method Editor (IME); for use with Chinese, Japanese, and Korean character sets (IE5)
Defines a grid to be used in laying out Japanese or Chinese characters in a Web document.\nThis is a shorthand property for the layout grid properties discussed next (IE5)
Defines the size of the character grid used for laying out Japanese or Chinese characters in a Web document (IE5)
Defines the gridline value used for laying out Japanese or Chinese characters in a Web document (IE5)
Defines if the text layout grid uses one or two dimensions (IE5)
Defines the type of grid to be used for laying out Japanese or Chinese characters in a Web document (IE5)
Defines line-breaking rules for Japanese text (IE5)
Defines how content should behave when it exceeds the width of its enclosing element (IE4)
Defines how content should behave when it exceeds the height of its enclosing element (IE4)
Defines the alignment of ruby text as defined by the <rt> element, in relation to base text defined by the <ruby> tag (IE5)
Defines the overhang of ruby text as defined by the <rt> tag, in relation to base text defined by the <ruby> tag (IE5)
Defines the position of ruby text as defined by the <rt> tag, in relation to base text defined by the <ruby> tag (IE5)

Defines a color for the top and left edges of the scroll box in a scrollbar; this and the related scrollbar\nproperties can be applied to the browser window scrollbar when used with the body element, or \nto other elements when used in conjunction with clipping properties (IE5.5)
Defines a color for the arrows in a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines the base color for a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines a shadow color for the right and bottom edges of a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines a color for the face of a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines a color for the top and left edges of a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines a color for the right and bottom edges of a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines a color for the right and bottom edges of a scrollbar (IE5.5)
Defines spacing values for text; used when combining different types of characters,\nsuch as regular text, ideographic text, and numeric characters (IE5)
Property provides greater control over how justified text should be aligned and spaced (IE5)
Defines the ratio between kashida expansion and white space expansion in justified text\n(kashida is a typographic effect used with Arabic writing systems) (IE5.5)
Defines the position of underlining set with the text-decoration property (IE5)
Used to allow line breaks within words, primarily for use with Asian languages (IE5)
Can be set to allow line breaks within words when content exceeds the limits of its containing element (IE5.5)
Can be used to set text flow appropriate for European alphabets or East Asian alphabets\nValues are lr-tb (left-to-right, top-to-bottom) and tb-rl (top-to-bottom, right-to-left) (IE5.5)
Can be used to define a magnification scale for an element. Can be used with scripting to create rollover effects (IE5)
